translation.Message_0_Page_0: We don't seem to have the correct type of blood bags, which is an issue. <color=legendary>Master Sergeant Tennyson</color> is in critical condition and will need a blood transfusion to survive.
translation.Message_1_Page_0: <color=legendary>Master Sergeant Tennyson</color> could have made it, had we the correct blood type. We'll have to see about blood donations again. But until then, could you go get us some bloodbags?
